au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util

Interface IConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertiesConfig, PropertiesIntersectionConfig

    public interface IConfig
    Interface for configuration class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String dumpConfiguration()
      Return a configuration dump containing all the configuration key values.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllProperties()
      Gets a map of all the configuration properties in key => value pairs.
      java.lang.String getConfigurationInfomation()
      Gets implementation specific configuration information.
      java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the configuration value of the property key.
      java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String defaultValue)
      Returns the configuration value of the property key.
      void reload()
      Reload configuration from a persistent store.
      void removeProperty(java.lang.String key)
      Removes a property from configuration.
      void serialise()
      Write back configuration to a persistent store.
      void setProperty(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a property that will be persistently stored to configuration on the next configuration serialisation.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the configuration value of the property key. null is returned if the key cannot be found in configuration. If the configured value is an empty string, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the configuration item
        Returns:
        configuration value set in properties if found, null otherwise

      • getProperty

        java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key,
                           java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns the configuration value of the property key. If the key value cannot be found in configuration, the defaultValue parameter is returned. If the configured value is an empty string, defaultValue is returned.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the configuration item
        defaultValue - the value to return if the key value is not found
        Returns:
        configuration value set in properties if found, null otherwise

      • getAllProperties

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllProperties()
        Gets a map of all the configuration properties in key => value pairs.
        Returns:
        all configuration properties

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(java.lang.String key,
               java.lang.String value)
        Sets a property that will be persistently stored to configuration on the next configuration serialisation.
        Parameters:
        key - name of configuration item
        value - value of configuration item

      • removeProperty

        void removeProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a property from configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - property to remove

      • reload

        void reload()
        Reload configuration from a persistent store. If the in memory configuration store is dirty, any changes will be lost.

      • serialise

        void serialise()
        Write back configuration to a persistent store.

      • dumpConfiguration

        java.lang.String dumpConfiguration()
        Return a configuration dump containing all the configuration key values.
        Returns:
        dump of configuration

      • getConfigurationInfomation

        java.lang.String getConfigurationInfomation()
        Gets implementation specific configuration information. The information returned should be helpful to print diagnostics for configuration errors.
        Returns:
        configuration information
